name: Scepter of Khione
printed_effect:
The Empowered Elestral gets +2 {attack} and +1 {defense}.
When Khione is Enchanted and the
Empowered Elestral destroys an Elestral
in battle you can Special Cast a
1 Spirit {frost} Elestral from your hand.
effect: The Empowered Elestral gets +2 {attack} and +1 {defense}. When Khione is Enchanted and the Empowered Elestral destroys an Elestral in battle you can Special Cast a 1 Spirit {frost} Elestral from your hand.
